page.title: 02A DAY IN THE LIFE OF RUTH.
page.content: My name is Ruth Glazzard. I am 9 years old. On Thursdays I wake at 7a.m.and read. At 7.30 I dress and go downstairs. I have a cereal called Frosties and some toasted currant bread. When I have washed and cleaned my teeth I pick up my violin and go out. I cross the road with the lollipop lady then walk to school. Our first task on Thursdays is handwriting so I get my book ready. Then we say prayers and Mrs Thomas takes the register.During the morning I have my violin lesson and do mathematics, science and comprehension. At lunchtime I have cheese sandwiches, an apple, a drink of squash and some chocolate.
